meta.title: Markdown
meta.description: a page with many mdx & markdown features

mdx:
# Markdown / MDX Stress Test This is a page to stress test markdown & mdx syntax usages to see if everything renders without issues. ## Basic Markdown Basic markdown is supported. ### Headings See the bold Text above? This is a heading. Not gonna demonstrate them, they are used everwhere on a page, but this is what you'd use in markdown or mdx files to write one: ```markdown # H1 Most important ## H2 Heading ### H3 Heading #### H4 Heading ##### H5 Heading ###### H6 Least important ``` ### Emphasizing Text #### Italic Text _Italic text_ is done with underscores `_String to highlight_` #### Bold Text **Bold text** is done with double asterisks `**String to highlight**` #### Bold + Italic Text **_Bold + Italic text_** is done with tripple asterisks `***String to highlight***` ### Code Code can be displayed inline or in a code-block, use single backticks for inline-code or tripple backticks for code blocks. Look at this: `export const App = () =>
App
` this was inline code. And here is a code-block: ```jsx export const App = () => { return (

App

); }; ``` ### Blockquote This is how a regular blockquote looks. There are more variants of blockquotes but they are belonging to the Github flavored Markdown though. > Sugar plum shortbread dragée chocolate bar lollipop. Bonbon soufflé cupcake > cotton candy bear claw muffin tiramisu ### Links Link look pretty basic: - Internal link: - [Design Tokens](/design-tokens) - External link: - [commercetools homepage](http://www.commercetools.com) ### Images Images work as well. ```markdown ![alt text](https://picsum.photos/seed/2/640/480 "Image title") ``` ![alt text](https://picsum.photos/seed/2/640/480 "Random office pic") ### Lists #### Ordered List Simple list: 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item 4. Fourth item --- 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item 1. Indented item 2. Indented item 4. Fourth item --- #### Unordered Lists Simple list: - First item - Second item - Third item - Fourth item List with a sublist: - First item - Second item - Third item - Indented item - Indented item - Fourth item ## Github flavored Markdown ### Tables | **Product Name** | **Category** | **Price** | **Discount** | **Stock** | **Ratings** | **Brand** | **Color** | **Shipping** | **In Stock** | | --------------------------------- | ---------------- | --------- | ------------ | --------- | --------------- | ---------- | ----------- | ----------------- | ------------ | | **Wireless Bluetooth Headphones** | Electronics | $79.99 | 10% off | 124 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.5) | SoundWave | Black | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Leather Sofa Set** | Furniture | $999.00 | 15% off | 15 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | HomeLux | Brown | Free Shipping | No | | **Smartphone 6 Pro** | Electronics | $699.00 | 5% off | 57 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | TechSmart | Blue | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Gaming Laptop 15"** | Electronics | $1,499.00 | 20% off | 32 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.2) | GamerX | Gray | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Organic Green Tea** | Food & Beverages | $15.99 | No Discount | 302 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.4) | PureLeaf | Green | Standard Shipping | Yes | | **Men’s Running Shoes** | Apparel | $79.99 | 30% off | 85 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.6) | FitStep | Red | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Stainless Steel Watch** | Accessories | $249.00 | 10% off | 67 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | TimeMaster | Silver | Free Shipping | No | | **Coffee Maker 12 Cup** | Kitchen | $89.99 | No Discount | 121 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | BrewMaster | Black | Standard Shipping | Yes | | **Children’s Toy Set** | Toys & Games | $24.99 | 15% off | 205 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.3) | FunTime | Multi-color | Free Shipping | Yes | ### Footnotes - Super cheap, buy now [^1] [^1]: It's actually expensive. ### Strikethrough ~one~ or ~~two~~ tildes. ### Tasklist - [ ] to do - [x] done ### Highlighted blockquotes > [!NOTE] > Highlights information that users should take into account, even when > skimming. > [!IMPORTANT] > Crucial information necessary for users to succeed. > [!WARNING] > Critical content demanding immediate user attention due to potential risks. > [!CAUTION] > Negative potential consequences of an action. > [!TIP] > Optional information to help a user be more successful. Maybe with more text ## Blockquotes ### Simple case > Sugar plum shortbread dragée chocolate bar lollipop. Bonbon soufflé cupcake > cotton candy bear claw muffin tiramisu chocolate cake icing. Cake marshmallow > tart pastry caramels tootsie roll. Gummi bears liquorice tiramisu toffee tart. ### With cite > Sugar plum shortbread dragée chocolate bar lollipop. Bonbon soufflé cupcake > cotton candy bear claw muffin tiramisu chocolate cake icing. Cake marshmallow > tart pastry caramels tootsie roll. Gummi bears liquorice tiramisu toffee tart. > > - Dorothy from wizard of oz ### Two paragraphs in a blockquote > Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle. > > The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor and keep the > fire fed with wood. ### Nested blockquote > Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle. > > > The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor and keep > > the fire fed with wood. ### Blockquotes with Other Elements > #### The quarterly results look great! > > - Revenue was off the chart. > - Profits were higher than ever. > > --- > > Kinda fancy looking, right? ### Keyboard Combinations To enable fruitcake mode, press Ctrl + Alt + Space.

overview.mdx:
# Markdown / MDX Stress Test This is a page to stress test markdown & mdx syntax usages to see if everything renders without issues. ## Basic Markdown Basic markdown is supported. ### Headings See the bold Text above? This is a heading. Not gonna demonstrate them, they are used everwhere on a page, but this is what you'd use in markdown or mdx files to write one: ```markdown # H1 Most important ## H2 Heading ### H3 Heading #### H4 Heading ##### H5 Heading ###### H6 Least important ``` ### Emphasizing Text #### Italic Text _Italic text_ is done with underscores `_String to highlight_` #### Bold Text **Bold text** is done with double asterisks `**String to highlight**` #### Bold + Italic Text **_Bold + Italic text_** is done with tripple asterisks `***String to highlight***` ### Code Code can be displayed inline or in a code-block, use single backticks for inline-code or tripple backticks for code blocks. Look at this: `export const App = () =>
App
` this was inline code. And here is a code-block: ```jsx export const App = () => { return (

App

); }; ``` ### Blockquote This is how a regular blockquote looks. There are more variants of blockquotes but they are belonging to the Github flavored Markdown though. > Sugar plum shortbread dragée chocolate bar lollipop. Bonbon soufflé cupcake > cotton candy bear claw muffin tiramisu ### Links Link look pretty basic: - Internal link: - [Design Tokens](/design-tokens) - External link: - [commercetools homepage](http://www.commercetools.com) ### Images Images work as well. ```markdown ![alt text](https://picsum.photos/seed/2/640/480 "Image title") ``` ![alt text](https://picsum.photos/seed/2/640/480 "Random office pic") ### Lists #### Ordered List Simple list: 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item 4. Fourth item --- 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item 1. Indented item 2. Indented item 4. Fourth item --- #### Unordered Lists Simple list: - First item - Second item - Third item - Fourth item List with a sublist: - First item - Second item - Third item - Indented item - Indented item - Fourth item ## Github flavored Markdown ### Tables | **Product Name** | **Category** | **Price** | **Discount** | **Stock** | **Ratings** | **Brand** | **Color** | **Shipping** | **In Stock** | | --------------------------------- | ---------------- | --------- | ------------ | --------- | --------------- | ---------- | ----------- | ----------------- | ------------ | | **Wireless Bluetooth Headphones** | Electronics | $79.99 | 10% off | 124 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.5) | SoundWave | Black | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Leather Sofa Set** | Furniture | $999.00 | 15% off | 15 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | HomeLux | Brown | Free Shipping | No | | **Smartphone 6 Pro** | Electronics | $699.00 | 5% off | 57 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | TechSmart | Blue | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Gaming Laptop 15"** | Electronics | $1,499.00 | 20% off | 32 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.2) | GamerX | Gray | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Organic Green Tea** | Food & Beverages | $15.99 | No Discount | 302 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.4) | PureLeaf | Green | Standard Shipping | Yes | | **Men’s Running Shoes** | Apparel | $79.99 | 30% off | 85 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.6) | FitStep | Red | Free Shipping | Yes | | **Stainless Steel Watch** | Accessories | $249.00 | 10% off | 67 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | TimeMaster | Silver | Free Shipping | No | | **Coffee Maker 12 Cup** | Kitchen | $89.99 | No Discount | 121 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5) | BrewMaster | Black | Standard Shipping | Yes | | **Children’s Toy Set** | Toys & Games | $24.99 | 15% off | 205 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4.3) | FunTime | Multi-color | Free Shipping | Yes | ### Footnotes - Super cheap, buy now [^1] [^1]: It's actually expensive. ### Strikethrough ~one~ or ~~two~~ tildes. ### Tasklist - [ ] to do - [x] done ### Highlighted blockquotes > [!NOTE] > Highlights information that users should take into account, even when > skimming. > [!IMPORTANT] > Crucial information necessary for users to succeed. > [!WARNING] > Critical content demanding immediate user attention due to potential risks. > [!CAUTION] > Negative potential consequences of an action. > [!TIP] > Optional information to help a user be more successful. Maybe with more text ## Blockquotes ### Simple case > Sugar plum shortbread dragée chocolate bar lollipop. Bonbon soufflé cupcake > cotton candy bear claw muffin tiramisu chocolate cake icing. Cake marshmallow > tart pastry caramels tootsie roll. Gummi bears liquorice tiramisu toffee tart. ### With cite > Sugar plum shortbread dragée chocolate bar lollipop. Bonbon soufflé cupcake > cotton candy bear claw muffin tiramisu chocolate cake icing. Cake marshmallow > tart pastry caramels tootsie roll. Gummi bears liquorice tiramisu toffee tart. > > - Dorothy from wizard of oz ### Two paragraphs in a blockquote > Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle. > > The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor and keep the > fire fed with wood. ### Nested blockquote > Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle. > > > The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor and keep > > the fire fed with wood. ### Blockquotes with Other Elements > #### The quarterly results look great! > > - Revenue was off the chart. > - Profits were higher than ever. > > --- > > Kinda fancy looking, right? ### Keyboard Combinations To enable fruitcake mode, press Ctrl + Alt + Space.
